Video Caption: China Winter Olympics Ratings TANK! | Down Nearly 50% As Sports Media Bends The Knee To CCP
Comment:
The fact that a Dutch reporter covering the Opening Ceremonies got roughed up by security shows that the CCP means business.  It's either follow CCP mandates, or there is no coverage.

Should we simply not broadcast the Olympics?  As appealing as that idea is, our athletes have trained too hard to not have their performances broadcast.

Is following CCP rules any different than my parents telling me not to sing the praises of Richard Nixon, in the midst of the Watergate investigation, in front of my grandfather the Democrat?  No.
